1:
def find_children(dancing_brigade):
    mothers = sorted(list(set([i for i in dancing_brigade if i.isupper()])))
    result = ''
    for mother in mothers:
        mother_children = [i for i in dancing_brigade if i == mother.lower() or i == mother]
        result += mother + ''.join(sorted([i for i in mother_children if i != mother]))
    return result

def find_children(dancing_brigade):
    mothers = sorted(list(set([i for i in dancing_brigade if i.isupper()])))
    result = ''
    for mother in mothers:
        mother_children = [i for i in dancing_brigade if i == mother.lower() or i == mother]
        result += mother + ''.join(sorted([i for i in mother_children if i != mother]))
    return result
